singleItemContent: p> Do you like looking at yourself in the mirror?
p> Have you ever bought mirrors?
p> Do you usually take a mirror with you?
p> Would you use mirrors to decorate your room?
p> Describe a rule you don't like.
p> Why you don't like it
p> How others feel about the rule
p> And explain whether you have followed the rule
p> What kinds of rules that students should follow at school?
p> Do people often violate the rules in China?
p>  What rules should children follow at home?
